title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: If we talk about our protofilo for all time. The coins we held during all time we in crypto. Then these were my holdings: 1. Eth  (Still holding)2. Avax  (Still holding)3. SOL (Still holding)4. Mana (Still holding with regret)5. Netvrk (Still holding with regret)Also I sold some other coins like - Sand token. Crypto.com, Bnb, Cake, Ogn, Ada

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Bagged several altcoins to my portfolio this year. I recently add GMT to it, since it has cause stir online and let's say it's no longer a shitcoin but rather a memecoin. The coin have done so many bullish actions in the past weeks and I'm hoping on it to do more. Perhaps bagged it when it was $0.4 and sold it when it hits $3 due to my fear that it might later dip. Currently now, GMT is in serious dip and I have bagged some inother to sell it in the nearest future. My portfolio always bomb when ever any altcoins I bought shoots to the moon. For now, I'm holding GMT, Dusk, Win, Solana. These coins are expected to explore any time soon.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: I'm still holding my ETH and BNB since then and when the new projects came here like POLYGON, I also try to accumulate as much as possible because I know this can be a big project as well and there's no doubt for this. I'm planning to hold these coins for the next 3 to 5 years because I know that is the best time for me get some profit as well. Have some good coins on your portfolio because it can save you from a bear market, that is for sure.

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on May 08, 2022, 08:45:20 PMIf we talk about our protofilo for all time. The coins we held during all time we in crypto. Then these were my holdings: 1. Eth  (Still holding)2. Avax  (Still holding)3. SOL (Still holding)4. Mana (Still holding with regret)5. Netvrk (Still holding with regret)Also I sold some other coins like - Sand token. Crypto.com, Bnb, Cake, Ogn, AdaSurprised to see BNB, CRO, and Cake on coins that you dumped these three are still in my portfolio and will always be there, they have proven their worth in the market for so many years and these three are innovative, their platform are always updated to suit the community needs, Crypto.com is also a good coin, their marketing is top-notch not many projects in the Crypto space can sponsor huge events like UFC, you need to consider these coins.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: I only have Bitcoin (BTC) and Oasis Network (ROSE) in my wallet, I've been holding it for a while.There are 2 different reasons why I still hold Bitcoin (BTC) and Oasis Network (ROSE), for Bitcoin itself, I still hold it because I believe that the price will continue to increase, over time, scarcity will occur in Bitcoin. As for the Oasis Network, I'm holding back because looking at the future of these coins, they are still evolving over time.

comments.author: TelolettOm
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on May 08, 2022, 08:45:20 PM1. Eth  (Still holding)2. Avax  (Still holding)3. SOL (Still holding)4. Mana (Still holding with regret)5. Netvrk (Still holding with regret)From these lists, the similarity is only on ETH.I have ever had some similar coins but have sold them.Now, some of my portfolios besides ETH are:- Bitcoin (of course still holding)- BNB (of course still holding)- TKO (still holding but with regret why I didn't sell at $3 at that time Â  )- ADA (similar to TKO)and some other shitcoins

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on May 08, 2022, 08:45:20 PMIf we talk about our protofilo for all time. The coins we held during all time we in crypto. Then these were my holdings: ...4. Mana (Still holding with regret)5. Netvrk (Still holding with regret)Also I sold some other coins like - Sand token. Crypto.com, Bnb, Cake, Ogn, AdaI'd just wonder about your comment " holding with regret". Have you missed the chance to sell them high? Well, these coins aren't on my list either, they don't have potential in the first place but since it was in your wallet now, I think you need to sacrifice them. Sell them as well and replace them with potential coins.If I were you, take your time to buy more on the leading coins like BTC and ETH, or add more to your Solana. That I believe they are worth enough to hold.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: I still have one of altcoin in my wallet caused by i have sold all of my tokens last year. The dump was predictable. It seems you bought your MANA at the peak price and the price is going down right now, right? That's why you are regretting it not to sell your mana at the peak price and then buy at the dip right now. Only converting all of my tokens in the past into the stable tokens that will save my position during the bearish trend like this. i just used it as reserved funds.

comments.author: Dr.Osh
comments.body: what I'm holding on to right now is BNB and BUSD. I may have other coins in my portfolio, but I may intend to sell them for BUSD or BNB. it's just that the price is currently falling, so it doesn't hurt to hold on for a certain period of time.other than that, I think, I will only keep the 3 coins that are in your portfolio. anyway, I'd probably focus more on ethereum. it's just that the high ethereum fees made me refocus on BNB for now. hope the price can recover. however, if you want to create a long term portfolio, always choose the most popular coins, and have real functionality. I myself plan to have only BTC, ETH, and BNB for the long term

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: How do you mean with 'All time'? How long duration are you talking about? Explain your regret with MANA?

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I see some of the coins you are holding are not meant to prosper this year, that's kinda hard especially when you have lots of expectations for such coins and they ended up worth almost nothing in the end. when it comes to altcoins it's kinda hard to tell which one will bloom for the next years to come because the competitions are tight especially when there's no good developer to backup their project and no influencers to promote them.

comments.author: indo1
comments.body: Looking at the list of coins you mentioned on average network-based I would prefer to keep Ethereum longer. Although AVAX, SOL etc. is on the rise lately, but they haven't got a history like natural ethereum, if you look at the past of ethereum which even has many competitors they call themselves the 'ethereum killer' but that doesn't make ethereum die, they are the ones who die in the extreme market.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Only the major coins like bitcoin and ethereum. Im also having stable tokens as altcoins that in my wallet. I used these coins and token as all time coins in my portfolios caused by these are the most important coins. Having altcoins these days are vert risky decision and look at how bitcoin is also going down to the 33k. Im sure that bitcoin will be going to the 32k as soon as possible and if this support will break and there will be another disaster for bitcoin and crypto

Right now I keep holding with one altcoin only as LTC coins, bought on several kinds price and keep holding waiting for LTC can reach higher price again, next target I want to sell LTC coin above $200 and hope as soon possible have chance with LTC can reach and back to higher price without drop again right now under $92.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I believe what they say, if we really want to see our assets safe in the future there is no good investment except in bitcoin or ethereum. Since bitcoin is too expensive, I prefer to keep everything on ethereum without the slightest hesitation. I'm sure that among the many projects ethereum has the potential to be far more special, it makes me one step more confident than other projects.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: I have only the smartcontract coins right now. Im not even seeing bitcoin as a worthy coins during the dump. I prefer to use stable coin instead of holding major assets caused by it can still go down. The smartcontract coins can recover so fast once bitcoin will become bullish again. It needs to be patience waiting for the dump to end. You're holding a lot of coins. It seems mana and netvrk were buying at the peak price but dumped to the bottom. It's a very hard time to hold token in the major lose.

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: It's not a holding time yet, whales are selling and people are taking profits, im sure that BTC will taste the 20,000$ range once again so that's a good buying time for long term hold, selling your ETH at 3200$ and buying back at 1500$ is awesome mate.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: On the list I only still have avalanche. Also bought the dip and believed that it will still be a good stance on market even though we are on bearish. Ive tried their platform and it works like ethereum.Ive invested on this on early times and were able to monetize some on its peak and able to buy back it now. So I think Im gonna hold it for a while cause I believe it will be one one of the alts that will be a top performing project when btc explode again.
